subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The cyclist Jeannie Longo of France, a five-time world champion, has clinched a berth in her seventh Olympics at the age of 49. Longo staked her claim last week with wins in the road race and the time trial at the French national championships.
snippet: The cyclist Jeannie Longo of France, a five-time world champion, has clinched a berth in her seventh Olympics at the age of 49. Longo staked her claim last week with wins in the road race and the time trial at the French national championships.
